p: Finally, we contribute to forest management in three ways: (i) our pitch canker future suitability map can be employed to assess biotic exposure of any other susceptible species in the Spanish Iberian Peninsula; (ii) we provide a high resolution and scientifically solid assessment of exposure for P. pinaster in the Spanish Iberian Peninsula that can be directly employed in delineating its breeding and management programmes; and (iii) our approach can be easily transferred to any other species.
